xwikidoc.name: CourseSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: #if($doc.name == 'CourseSheet')Course Sheet#{else}$services.display.title($doc, {'displayerHint': 'default'})#end
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} ## You can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object. ## At first you should keep the default presentation and just save the document.
$xwiki.ssfx.use("js/xwiki/table/table.css")
#set($class = $doc.getObject('Structure.CourseClass').xWikiClass)
## #set ($val = $util.parseInt($doc.display('Credits')) + 1)
==$doc.display('CourseName')==
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**1. Information about the Study Program** |**1.1** Higher Learning Institution|**$doc.display('higherLearningInstitution')** |**1.2 **Faculty|**$doc.display('Faculty')** |**1.3 **Department|**$doc.display('Department')** |**1.4 **Field of Study|**$doc.display('FieldofStudy')** |**1.5** Type of Degree|**$doc.display('TypeofDegree')** |**1.6** Study Program / Qualification|**$doc.display('StudyProgram')**
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="8" %)**2. Information about the Course** |(% colspan="3" %)**2.1** Title|(% colspan="5" %)**$doc.display('CourseName')** |(% colspan="3" %)**2.2** Course Coordinator|(% colspan="5" %)**$doc.display('CourseCoordinator')** |(% colspan="3" %)**2.3** Laboratory Coordinators|(% colspan="5" %)**$doc.display('LaboratoryCoordinators')** |**2.4** Year of study|**$doc.display('YearofStudy')**|**2.5** Semester|**$doc.display('Semester')**|**2.6** Evaluation Type|**$doc.display('EvaluationType')**|**2.7** Course Type|**$doc.display('CourseType')**
~* //OB – Compulsory / OP – Optional//
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="6" %)**3. Total Estimated Time **(hours per semester and study activities) |**3.1** Number of hours per week|**$doc.display('HoursPerWeek')**|**3.2** Course hours|**$doc.display('CourseHoursPerWeek')**|**3.3** Laboratory hours|**$doc.display('LabHoursPerWeek')** |**3.4 **Total hours planned|#set ($totalTimePlanned = $util.parseInt($doc.display('CourseHoursTotal')) + $util.parseInt($doc.display('LabHoursTotal'))) **$totalTimePlanned**|**3.5** Course hours|**$doc.display('CourseHoursTotal')**|**3.6** Laboratory hours|**$doc.display('LabHoursTotal')** |(% colspan="5" %)Time distribution|hours |(% colspan="5" %)Individual study using manuals, course notes, etc.|**$doc.display('CourseStudyHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Individual study in the library, using specialized electronic tools, field work|**$doc.display('LibraryStudyHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Preparation of seminaries/laboratories, homework, papers, portfolios, essays|**$doc.display('HomeworkHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Tutorials |**$doc.display('TutorialsHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Exams|**$doc.display('ExaminationHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Other activities|**$doc.display('OtherActivitiesHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)**3.7 **Total hours of individual study [ST + DS + PS]| #set ($indStudy = $util.parseInt($doc.display('CourseStudyHours')) + $util.parseInt($doc.display('LibraryStudyHours')) + $util.parseInt($doc.display('HomeworkHours')) + $util.parseInt($doc.display('TutorialsHours'))) **$indStudy** |(% colspan="5" %)**3.8 **Total hour per semester [no. of credits x 30 = T + E + C +TI ]| #set ($totalTime = $totalTimePlanned + $util.parseInt($doc.display('ExaminationHours')) + $indStudy) **$totalTime** |(% colspan="5" %)**3.9 **Number of credits|**$doc.display('Credits')**
~* //Obs. T = C + S//
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**4. Preconditions **(if applicable) |**4.1 **Curriculum preconditions|$doc.display('PreconditionsCurriculum') |**4.2 **Competence preconditions|$doc.display('PreconditionsCompetence')
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**5. Conditions **(if applicable) |**5.1 **For courses|$doc.display('MaterielRequirementsCourse') |**5.2 **For laboratories|$doc.display('MaterielRequirementsLab')
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**6. Specific competencies** |**Professional Competencies**|$doc.display('CompetenciesProfessional') |**Transversal competencies**|$doc.display('CompetenciesTransversal')
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**7. Objectives** |**7.1 General Objective**|$doc.display('ObjectivesGeneral') |**7.2 Specific objectives**|$doc.display('ObjectivesSpecific')
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="6" %)**8.
